p: Studies have shown that SARS-CoV-2 causes worse outcomes and a higher mortality rate in older people (more than 60 years of age) and those with comorbidities such as hypertension, cardiovascular disease, diabetes mellitus, chronic respiratory disease, and chronic kidney disease [ 43, 44]. The COVID-19 virus appears to cause mild infections in children. Though the reasons for this tolerance is unknown, some researchers suggested that non-susceptibility of children to coronavirus may be due to separate ACE activity [ 45], and active innate immune response caused by trained immunity (secondary to live-vaccines and frequent viral infections). Adult patients are believed to have suppressed adaptive immunity and dysfunctional innate immune response [ 46].
